name: Space Snappers: Legacy
description:
An elite squadron of fighter ships embark on a mission to take down the enemy forces!

  • Currently 8 playable ships with different abilities and stats, with more to come!
  • Upgrades: Increase your speed or damage,  two unique upgrades or your ship's ultimate attack.
  • Increasing difficulty gameplay loop: every time you finish all the stages, it repeats on a higher difficulty. A total of 5 tiers exist!
  • Instant action! Jump in on any of the first three tiers of difficulty, or opt in for a more casual experience with no worries of game over!

Currently in early access. The first two of five stages are complete and fully playable, with the difficulty increase loop already in place. Eight of the more than twelve currently planned ships are available.
